description: Dictation refactor: replace SpeechRecognition with cross-browser RecordButton + async Groq Whisper transcription; fix session replay CSS rendering.

changes.description: Fix session replay CSS rendering by injecting parent-page styles into the rrweb iframe, and enable inlineStylesheet in rrweb config so recordings capture styles inline.

details.summary: inlineStylesheet set to true in rrweb config. ResponseDetails SessionReplayPanel now injects all parent-page CSS rules into the replay iframe on FullsnapshotRebuilded, fixing styled rendering when replaying prod recordings on localhost.

changes.description: Replace SpeechRecognition-based VoiceDictation with a cross-browser RecordButton (pure MediaRecorder) and async server-side transcription via Groq Whisper. Fixes missing microphone button on Firefox.

details.summary: FeedbackQuestionnaire: removed VoiceDictation (SpeechRecognition, Firefox-incompatible), wired three RecordButton components to existing MediaRecorder pipeline. After successful submit, invokes new transcribe-dictation edge function (fire-and-forget). Edge function downloads dictation_recordings audio from storage, sends to Groq whisper-large-v3-turbo, writes transcript to experiment_responses only if column is empty. Requires GROQ_API_KEY Supabase secret.
